snippet: HBO was eager to tap Mr. Simmons’s base of readers of his sports column, but that audience failed to materialize....
lead_paragraph: HBO was eager to tap Mr. Simmons’s base of readers of his sports column, but that audience failed to materialize.

headline.main: Bill Simmons’s HBO Program Is Canceled
headline.print_headline: HBO Ends Talk Show for Ex-Star of ESPN
